text: Nate & Jeremiah By Design is an American reality television series on TLC. It stars Nate Berkus and Jeremiah Brent and premiered on April 8, 2017. It has appeared on HGTV retitled as Nate and Jeremiah: Save My House. ==Premise== Nate & Jeremiah By Design follows Nate Berkus and Jeremiah Brent as they help homeowners with renovation disasters all while balancing marriage and raising their kids. ==Production== Season 1 premiered on April 8, 2017. Season 2 premiered on April 7, 2018.
